channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- User Activity Log
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- User Activity Log

item.title: CVE-2023-2761|2024-10-24T15:03:30.446Z -- unknown -- user%20activity%20log
item.description: The User Activity Log WordPress plugin before 1.6.3 does not properly sanitise and escape the `txtsearch` parameter before using it in a SQL statement in some admin pages, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by high privilege users such as admin.
